article:
Who can help you if you want to be a great man when you grow up?  Maybe   you think parents, teachers or others can help you. But  _  fact, all these people only help you to help  _ .
There have been many great men in history. They had few people to help them. They could not get good education,  either . But they tried their best  to learn  and never gave up. One famous teacher in England once  _  his students, "I can't make you great men,  _  I can help you make great men of yourselves."
However, some young people do nothing and they  depend on  others. If these young people can see their weak points and change their ways, they can be  _  . they are nothing now, and will be  _  in the future, unless  they take the advice of their parents and teachers, and most importantly, depend on themselves.
